item.title: How To Publish a WADL with Mule's REST Router Module
item.description: It seems to me that Mule’s REST Router module, which I’ve previously blogged about, is gaining popularity as a viable alternative to the Jersey module. Yet, the REST Router has a serious limitation in that it’s unable to generate a WADL: the REST equivalent of a WSDL.
